title.quote: Scalable regret for learning to control network-coupled subsystems with unknown dynamics

extractions.description: This paper addresses the problem of controlling an unknown linear quadratic Gaussian (LQG) system comprising multiple subsystems connected over a network. The authors aim to minimize and quantify the regret of their proposed control strategy relative to an oracle with complete system knowledge. They present a Thompson sampling-based learning algorithm that exploits the network structure to achieve a regret that scales linearly with the number of subsystems.

type.justification: Although numerical experiments are presented, the primary contribution is proposing and analyzing a theoretical control algorithm.
